local_content.intro_text: Los Angeles remains one of the most dynamic real estate markets in the country. Whether you're looking for a luxury home in Beverly Hills or an investment property in Silver Lake, our local experts understand the nuances of the LA market.

faqs.q: What is the maximum FHA loan limit in Los Angeles?
faqs.a: For 2026, the FHA one-unit loan limit in Los Angeles County is $1,149,825.

faqs.q: Are there local down payment assistance programs?
faqs.a: Yes, we work with several state and local agencies providing assistance to first-time buyers in CA.
